itemFunnyNote.text: The most likely to die next time.
The least likely to die next time.
Got freaky on a Friday night.
I think this one's a serial killer.
Hasn't called their mother in a while.

itemGunshotsDeath.text: Filled to the brim with bullets.

itemEnemy_BrackenDeath.text: Had their neck snapped by a Bracken.
Stared at a Bracken too long.

itemEnemy_EyelessDogDeath.text: Was eaten by an Eyeless Dog.
Got caught using a mechanical keyboard.
Wasn't quiet around an Eyeless Dog.

itemEnemy_ForestGiantDeath.text: Swallowed whole by a Forest Giant.

itemEnemy_CircuitBeesDeath.text: Electro-stung to death by Circuit Bees.

itemEnemy_EarthLeviathanDeath.text: Swallowed whole by an Earth Leviathan.

itemEnemy_BaboonHawkDeath.text: Was eaten by a Baboon Hawk.
Was mauled by a Baboon Hawk.

itemEnemy_JesterDeath.text: Mauled to death by a Jester.
Was the butt of the Jester's joke.

itemEnemy_CoilHeadDeath.text: Mauled to death by a Coil Head.
Got in a staring contest with a Coil Head.
Lost a staring contest with a Coil Head.

itemEnemy_SnareFleaDeath.text: Was suffocated by a Snare Flea.

itemEnemy_HygrodereDeath.text: Had an oopsie with a Hygrodere.

itemEnemy_HoarderBugDeath.text: Was mauled by a Hoarder Bug.
Was swarmed by a Hoarder Bug.
Was hoarded by a Hoarder Bug.
Tried to steal from a Hoarder Bug.

itemEnemy_SporeLizardDeath.text: Was bitten by a Spore Lizard.
Was puffed by a Spore Lizard.

itemEnemy_BunkerSpiderDeath.text: Ensnared in the Bunker Spider's web.

itemEnemy_MaskedPlayer_WearDeath.text: Nobody cared who they were until they put on the Mask.

itemEnemy_MaskedPlayer_VictimDeath.text: Was killed by a Masked coworker.
Became a tragedy at the hands of the Mask.

itemEnemy_Nutcracker_KickedDeath.text: Was kicked to death by a Nutcracker.
Got their nuts cracked by a Nutcracker.

itemEnemy_Nutcracker_ShotDeath.text: Was at the wrong end of a 21-gun salute.

itemPlayer_Jetpack_GravityDeath.text: Flew too close to the sun.

itemPlayer_Jetpack_BlastDeath.text: Blew up while using a Jetpack.

itemPlayer_Murder_MeleeDeath.text: Was bludgeoned to death by a coworker.
Was the victim of a murder.

itemPlayer_Murder_ShotgunDeath.text: Was shot to death by a coworker.
Was the victim of a murder.

itemPlayer_StunGrenadeDeath.text: Was the victim of a murder.

itemOther_DropshipDeath.text: Was crushed by the Item Dropship.
Got too impatient for their array.
